name: HN-SmartBuilding
0:
”Alexa, open smart building”
”Alexa, ask smart building to turn off light”
”Alexa, tell smart building to turn on light”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart building
des:
With the HN - Smart Building Alexa skill, you can easily control the smart devices in your building using simple voice commands. This skill allows you to turn on and turn off devices like lights, sockets, thermostats, and more, without needing to interact directly with a mobile app or web portal. You can control individual devices or groups of devices, making it convenient to manage multiple devices at once.

Key Features:
Turn on devices: Use voice commands like "Alexa, turn on the living room light" or "Alexa, switch on socket 1."
Turn off devices: Simply say "Alexa, turn off the fan" or "Alexa, switch off all lights."
Control specific devices or entire groups to streamline the process of managing multiple devices at once.
This skill is perfect for hands-free control of your smart building’s devices, enhancing your comfort and efficiency. Currently, the skill supports basic commands for turning devices on or off. Stay tuned for future updates with more advanced control features.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
